title: 1960 Sci-Fi - Mill of the Stone Women - Stone holds secrets, but hearts hold horrors - 4K

sources.title: 1960 Sci-Fi - Mill of the Stone Women - Stone holds secrets, but hearts hold horrors - 4K
sources.description:
Secrets carved in stone, destinies etched in blood.
Hans von Arnim, a young writer, visits Professor Wahl to document his eerie "Mill of the Stone Women," where lifelike statues hint at horrifying secrets. As Hans uncovers the truth about Elfie, Wahl's ill daughter, he is ensnared in a chilling tale of love, deception, and grotesque experiments that spiral into tragedy.

Original title: Il mulino delle donne di pietra (1960)
This film has English & Spanish audio options, and subtitles in many more languages.

Director: Giorgio Ferroni
Writers: Pieter van Weigen, Remigio Del Grosso, Giorgio Ferroni

Main cast:
Pierre Brice - Hans van Arnim
Scilla Gabel - Elfie
Wolfgang Preiss - Professor Wahl
Marisa Belli - Lia

Genres: Foreign Film, Italian cinema, Giallo, Technicolor, Horror, Sci-Fi
Release date: February 18, 1960 (Italy)
Filming location: Netherlands, Italy


@CultCinemaClassics
